name: Tool Demo: Dynamic Spiral
description: Demonstrates the new tool system with a procedurally generated spiral of colorful spheres. This scene is created using real-time JavaScript execution, showcasing how the AI can generate complex patterns programmatically rather than manually defining each object.

metadata.author: Tool System Demo
metadata.educationalNotes: This scene demonstrates the power of the new tool system. Instead of manually defining 40 sphere objects, we use a function call that generates them programmatically. This approach scales much better and allows for easy parameter adjustment through controllers.
